header_note: Know Your Customer (KYC) is a mandatory process for all financial services in India. Here is the list of documents required for various categories.
important_note: Banks may ask for additional documents depending on specific cases. Always carry original documents for verification.

items.name: NREGA Job Card
items.description: Duly signed by an officer of the State Government

items.name: Utility Bills
items.description: Electricity, Telephone, Post-paid mobile, Piped gas, Water bill (not older than 2 months)

items.name: PPO Order
items.description: Pension or family pension payment orders issued by Govt

items.name: Allotment Letter
items.description: Accommodation from Central/State Govt, Statutory/Regulatory bodies

items.name: Guardian KYC
items.description: OVDs of the parent/guardian are required
